channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- glusterfs:
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- glusterfs:

item.title: CVE-2018-10911|2024-08-05T07:54:35.246Z -- red%20hat -- glusterfs%3A
item.description: A flaw was found in the way dic_unserialize function of glusterfs does not handle negative key length values. An attacker could use this flaw to read memory from other locations into the stored dict value.
